headline: Warren, in Pivot, Spotlights Her Plan to Win
abstract: In the final days before the caucuses, Ms. Warren is taking on the electability question in ads, on the stump and on her campaign bus, urging voters to embrace “courage over cynicism” and “hope over fear.”
lead_paragraph: CEDAR RAPIDS, Iowa — The last time Senator Elizabeth Warren trundled across Iowa in a specially decorated campaign vehicle, an R.V. headed to the Iowa State Fair in August, it was wrapped with a cheeky play on the slogan for her sweeping agenda: “Honk if you’re ready for big, structural change!”
